CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer is readily soluble in common solvents such as chloroform , toluene , THF , and chlorobenzene.

Let's think step by step.

1. Chloroform
2. Toluene
3. THF (Tetrahydrofuran)
4. Chlorobenzene

These are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. They are all examples of common solvents in which the polymer is soluble.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Chloroform
2. Toluene
3. Tetrahydrofuran (THF)
4. Chlorobenzene

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. They are all examples of common solvents in which the polymer is soluble. I have removed any ambiguity by specifying Tetrahydrofuran (THF) instead of just THF.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Chloroform |
| Toluene |
| Tetrahydrofuran (THF) |
| Chlorobenzene |

The table lists the "Material Name" entities from the original paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column. The entities are written precisely as they appear in the original paragraph.
